entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:45 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -34.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Matagami Airport 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -34.0°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -39.0°C
Wind: WNW 22 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 34.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 34. Wind chill minus 48 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then periods of light snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 16.
